user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an email to me (feedback@medtechinnovations.com) with his thoughts on the new patient management system, and remind him to check his Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send an email to feedback@medtechinnovations.com with your thoughts and feedback on the new patient management system? Also, when you have a moment, please check your Notion workspace for the latest information and updates related to the project.

Thank you for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
MedTech Innovations

final_output:
